code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import{getRules,deleteRule}from'../../services/api';import'./RuleList.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const RuleList=()=>{const[rules,setRules]=useState([]);const navigate=useNavigate();useEffect(()=>{const fetchRules=async()=>{try{const data=await getRules();setRules(data);}catch(error){console.error('Error fetching rules:',error);}};fetchRules();},[]);const handleDelete=async id=>{try{await deleteRule(id);setRules(rules.filter(rule=>rule.id!==id));}catch(error){console.error('Error deleting rule:',error);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"rule-list-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Rules Management"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>navigate('/rules/new'),className:"create-btn",children:"Create New Rule"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("table",{className:"rules-table",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("thead",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Name"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Description"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Condition"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Action"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Status"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Actions"})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("tbody",{children:rules.map(rule=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:rule.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:rule.description}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:rule.condition}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:rule.action}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:rule.active?'Active':'Inactive'}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("td",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>navigate("/rules/edit/".concat(rule.id)),className:"edit-btn",children:"Edit"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>handleDelete(rule.id),className:"delete-btn",children:"Delete"})]})]},rule.id))})]})]});};export default RuleList;
